text: Ghizar District is northernmost part of the Northern Areas of Pakistan. Its capital is Gahkuch. Ghizer is also a contact point between Gilgit District and Chitral District (which are connected by Shandur Pass). Ghizer is a multi- ethnic district and three major languages are spoken: Khowar, Shina and Burushaski. There are also a few Wakhi speakers in Ishkoman. ==Tehsils== *Gupis Tehsil *Yasin Tehsil *Ishkomen Tehsil *Puniyal Tehsil Category:Districts of Gilgit-Baltistan
title: Ghizar District
